name: places/ChIJSVMu1HdZwokRdgLF68ZRF5o
formattedAddress: 139 Avenue A, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 139 Avenue A, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: I went there and immediately felt rushed. The nail tech couldn’t look at my nails for more than one second without looking around, as if she wanted to finish as soon as possible to get another customer. I had long nails with a point, grown out for over one month. I asked for a slight cut but to keep the point and almond shape. She cut my entire nail off and essentially did the opposite of an almond shape. I hate my nails. Mind you this is my second time coming here. I have been here before for a pedicure and had the exact same experience.

originalText.text: Always flawless and fast. The team is wonderful and fun- on top of being highly skilled. Your nails will look incredible and manicures hold up - seriously good massages if you have extra time. You’ll never be disappointed by Top A Nails.

text.text: Always flawless and fast. The team is wonderful and fun- on top of being highly skilled. Your nails will look incredible and manicures hold up - seriously good massages if you have extra time. You’ll never be disappointed by Top A Nails.

originalText.text: I cannot speak highly enough of this place. Mei is the owner and couldn’t be kinder- she remembers everything about you and makes you feel especially taken care of. They take their time and really have the fullest attention to detail. I have been to sooooo many salons in New York and have never found a place as wonderful as this.  I come every week as I live down the street  (usually I see Lulu but everyone is so good; Fiona, Cindy, Maggie.) I am a hair colorist  I’ve been coming here for years. I cannot tell you enough wonderful things. First of all it’s extremely clean, there’s an amazing assortment of nail polish colors, the prices are very fair. They are always so accommodating with appointments and really make sure that you are really happy. They remember exactly how you like your nails to be and the treatment is absolutely exceptional. My salon is only 4 blocks away and any time my clients or colleagues ask for a spot I always send them here and they have the same experience. They are accommodating for walk ins unless it’s super busy so it’s great to call ahead of time. I cannot say enough kind things about this place.

originalText.text: I got my nails done (regular polish) on Saturday. By Monday half of the nail polish had chipped off. I went back to the salon and they kindly fixed the chipped nails. The next day, the other half of the nail polished chipped off! They were sloppy with the application and cutting cuticles; now all my cuticles are peeling. I would have liked for my manicure to last more than 2 days. I would not recommend Top A Nail salon. See pictures for reference.

originalText.text: My fav place for 20 plus years ! Love all my ladies there and  owner team who are husband and wife
